p: There are a number of tools available capable of annotation and classification of viral sequences, such as NCBI genotyping tool (Rozanov et al. 2004), VIGOR (Viral Genome ORF Reader) (Wang et al. 2010), Viral Genome Organizer (VGO) (Upton et al. 2000), Genome Annotation Transfer Utility (GATU) (Tcherepanov et al. 2006), Virus Genotyping Tools (Alcantara et al. 2009), ZCURVE_V (Guo and Zhang 2006) and STAR (Subtype Analyser) (Myers et al. 2005).
